properties.body:
NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 08, DNC 19.
ROWBOAT SLEIPNIR, ONE PERSON ON BOARD,
REQUESTING ASSISTANCE IN 48-04.48N 025-01.10W.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO UK COAST GUARD,
PHONE: 4434 4382 0028,
FAX: 4413 2924 4547,
E-MAIL: UKMRCC@HMCG.GOV.UK.
